speech: Leaf Scald chawal ke patton ki ek bimari hai jo zyadatar fungus Monographella albescens ki wajah se hoti hai.
Yeh bimari zyadatar humid aur garm ilaqon mein hoti hai jahan chawal ki fasal ugai jati hai.
Symptoms mein patton par white ya gray streaks jo edges se shuru hote hain aur gradually puray patte ko affect karte hain.
Severe cases mein patte murjha jate hain aur yield kam ho jati hai.
Is bimari ko rokne ke liye fungicide ka istemal karein aur crop rotation ka amal follow karein.
Flooded fields ka pani theek se manage karein taake fungus ka spread control ho.

Leaf Scald chawal ke yield ko kaise affect karta hai?
